content: The Reptiles could easily do a full repeal Obamacare and simply blame Demwits for their inability to “fix” what they will say can’t be repaired due to complexity. Why? Their dumbass “Big Gov can’t do nuthin’ but private business and the free market can” base will buy that bullshit — hook, line, and sinker! Seems to me a lot of people forget exactly how Ryan was elected in the first place (other than gerrymndering)... It’s what the Koch’s want .. and what the Koch’s want they’re loyal minions will do their damnedest to deliver. Sorry to throw a few rocks into the ThinkProgess echo chamber..
